H0.text: Who was the Texas governor who was shot and wounded when John F Kennedy was assassinated. Allan Shivers

H1.text: Who was the Texas governor who was shot and wounded when John F Kennedy was assassinated. Price Daniel

H2.text: Who was the Texas governor who was shot and wounded when John F Kennedy was assassinated. Dolph Briscoe

H3.text: Who was the Texas governor who was shot and wounded when John F Kennedy was assassinated. John Connally

A4.text: John Connally was the governor of Texas from 1963 to 1969 and was seriously wounded while riding in the presidential limousine when Kennedy was assassinated.

A5.text: Connally was seriously wounded while riding in the presidential limousine when Kennedy was assassinated.
